Articles.Content:
Hi everyone, I am currently trying KIS/KAS and the surface experiment pack... 

I made a truck to start a little lab near the ksc. I go to the location, get the items from the inventary, but within 5 minute since i start to build my lab, aka placing items of surface experiment pack, my stations crash into kerbin...

has anyone already had this issue??

 

edit. i gave up on the truck, so decided to stop the wobbling on my space station with some struts. i go there, perform the eva, mount the struts. then i notice one part of my space station is now detached from the rest of the craft. not undocked, it just fell apart from my craft... what? O.o

i thought maybe i touched something, reloaded and tryied again... now everything goes well. i go back to the ksc. but when i go to the tracking station i see a space station debree... again what? O.o the part that fell apart in the previous case had just fell apart again... :|

Edited August 15, 2017 by KMenTaL989
